channel.title: About on WRCCDC
channel.description: Recent content in About on WRCCDC

item.title: Competition Format
item.description: Since the Western Regional of CCDC covers a large region of schools, we host multiple, invitationals each year to give many schools the opportunity to participate in the competition.

item.title: Mission
item.description: The mission of the Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition (CCDC) system is to provide a controlled, competitive environment for institutions with an information assurance or computer security curriculum to assess their student’s depth of understanding and operational competency in managing the challenges inherent in protecting a corporate network infrastructure and business information systems.
